thunder_shock.name: Thunder Shock
thunder_shock.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunder_wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder_wave.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

thunder_punch.name: Thunder Punch
thunder_punch.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
